review: We've been seeing Dr Pradeep A Ramesh Orthopaedic joint replacement surgeon for a while now, and they've been amazing. They've helped our family with all sorts of bone and muscle problems. They're really skilled at what they do, and they're always friendly and helpful. We're really grateful for all they've done for us, and we highly recommend them to anyone needing orthopaedic care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I know Doctor Pradeep A Ramesh since 3 yrs when I first met with a major Road traffic accident way back in 2019. I had multiple fractures in my left leg. Plate with 10 screws were kept for 3 yrs. Due to covid and various other reasons I could not get admitted in the last six months for Implant. Finally got admitted on March 17th 2022 and doctor Pradeep successfully did the implant for me. Very grateful to doctor Pradeep and the entire Ortho team for helping me recover and  get back to normal. I would strongly recommend Doctor Pradeep A Ramesh for any kind of Orthopaedic issues. Thanks again Doctor for saving many life and my Left Legüôèüôèüôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had an earlier experience with the same doctor who had treated me for a knee replacement that was indeed a great experience then, which now  made me feel I will be in safe  hands, his way of handling the case was excellent  that  I really appreciate the same. I pray the almighty to bless this Soul with his unique  experience to serve the masses at his best.........May your team grow, Whatever you do may the lords blessings always be with you.

* **** **** ****** **** *** *** **** ** *** *** *********** ****** *
I happened to meet him when my daughter had to get her tibia bone surgery last year .
Doctor Pradeep handled it very well and explained us everything in detail regarding the surgery .
 He is very friendly and answered my queries patiently whenever I used to call him or text him.
Recently we got her implant removed by him which went on very smoothly and my daughter is fit and fine now.
I highly recommend Dr. Pradeep with great gratitude .

Thank you so much Sir .
*** ******* * ****** ** * ********* ****** he helped me with everything on my leg injury he took good care of me when i was in the hospital for a week.
They were more bothered about whether the fees for consultation was paid than recommending a solution or treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Great Doc in making.....very supportive,  friendly and answers all queries. Thank you doctor...........
Well experience well treatment well suggestion and suddenly point out the patients problems and also good suggestion for patients problems thank you to doctor
